languages.text: Используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}, чтобы восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} членов отряда в бою, исцелить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g} или избавиться от некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативных эффектов{/g} (если ранения и такие {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекты{/g} есть). Если медкомплект экипирован, на панели в левой части экрана отобразится его иконка (если иконки нет, откройте инвентарь и экипируйте медкомплект). Чтобы использовать медкомплект, выберите его иконку на панели слева кнопками {console_bind|DPadVertical} и подтвердите выбор {console_bind|Confirm}. Затем наведитесь на персонажа, которому требуется лечение, или на его портрет в трекере инициативы, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Персонаж может использовать медкомплект, только находясь на соседней от цели клетке. Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж, освоивший Лечение в бою, Базовый навык: Медицина или вложивший хотя бы одно очко в развитие навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}медицина{/g} при повышении уровня. Количество восстановленного здоровья зависит от результата {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навыка{/g} Медицина. Каждый медкомплект имеет минимум два заряда — одно использование отнимает один заряд. Использованные медкомплекты будут исчезать с панели внизу экрана — не забывайте регулярно экипировать новые медкомплекты на персонажей. Обратите внимание: как и любое действие, лечение в бою отнимает {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действий{/g}.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae or have taken the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with one charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text:
Используйте медкомплект, чтобы восстановить здоровье членов отряда в бою. Выберите иконку медкомплекта в панели оружия слева, затем наведитесь на персонажа, которому требуется лечение, или на его портрет в трекере инициативы и нажмите {console_bind | Confirm}.
Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж со способностью Мастерство медицины — от результата проверки этой способности зависит количество восстановленных очков здоровья.
Лечение отнимает Очки Действий.

languages.text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.
languages.original_text: Используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}, чтобы восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} членов отряда в бою, исцелить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g} или избавиться от некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативных эффектов{/g} (если ранения и такие эффекты есть). Если медкомплект экипирован, на панели в левой части экрана отобразится его иконка (если иконки нет, откройте инвентарь и экипируйте медкомплект). Чтобы использовать медкомплект, выберите его иконку на панели слева кнопками {console_bind|DPadVertical} и подтвердите выбор {console_bind|Confirm}. Затем наведитесь на персонажа, которому требуется лечение, или на его портрет в трекере инициативы, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. Персонаж может использовать медкомплект, только находясь на соседней от цели клетке. Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж, освоивший Мастерство медицины. Количество восстановленных очков здоровья зависит от результата проверки навыка Медицина. Каждый медкомплект имеет минимум два заряда — одно использование отнимает один заряд. Использованные медкомплекты будут исчезать с панели внизу экрана — не забывайте регулярно экипировать новые медкомплекты на персонажей. Обратите внимание: как и любое действие, лечение в бою отнимает очки действий.

traits.locale_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an effect). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadY} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or their portrait in the initiative tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Medicae Training feature. A Medicae skill test determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with one charge being consumed per each use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's action points in combat.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

languages.text: Puedes usar un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para sanar las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los miembros de tu equipo, tratar una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o deshacerte de ciertos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} (si el personaje sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} de ese tipo). Si el personaje tiene equipado un botiquín, se mostrará su icono en la parte izquierda. En caso de que no aparezca dicho icono, abre el inventario y equipa un botiquín. Para usar un botiquín, selecciona su icono en la parte izquierda con {console_bind|DPadVertical} y confirma con {console_bind|Confirm}, y después pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} sobre el personaje que lo necesite o su retrato en el {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}cuadro de iniciativa{/g}. Los personajes solo pueden usar botiquines sobre un objetivo adyacente. Solo los personajes con la aptitud Médico de combate, la habilidad básica: Medicae o los que hayan avanzado la habilidad {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} al menos una vez pueden usar botiquines. Una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de Medicae determina la cantidad de heridas que restaura. Cada botiquín tiene 2 o más cargas y consume 1 por uso. Una vez agotado, desaparecerá del panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla, así que recuerda equipar nuevos botiquines con frecuencia. No olvides que curar, como la mayoría de acciones, cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} en combate.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Puedes usar un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para sanar las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los miembros de tu equipo, tratar una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o deshacerte de ciertos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g} (si el personaje sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de tal tipo). Si el personaje tiene equipado un botiquín, se mostrará su icono a la izquierda. En caso de que no aparezca dicho icono, abre el inventario y equipa un botiquín. Para usar un botiquín, selecciona su icono a la izquierda con {console_bind|DPadY} y confirma la selección con {console_bind|Confirm}. A continuación, elige al personaje que necesite tratamiento o su imagen en el cuadro de iniciativa y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. Los personajes solo pueden usar botiquines en objetivos próximos. Solo los personajes con la característica Instrucción {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g} pueden hacer uso de los botiquines. El número de heridas que se restaurarán viene dado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} medicae. Cada botiquín dispone de 2 o más cargas y se consume una con cada uso. Los botiquines usados desaparecen del panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla, así que recuerda equipar nuevos botiquines a tus personajes continuamente. Ten en cuenta que la curación, así como la mayoría de las acciones, consumen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} del personaje en combate.

languages.text: {g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用すると、戦闘中に部隊メンバーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}の回復、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}の治療、特定の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}の解除ができる（キャラクターが負傷中の場合や、対象{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けている場合）。キャラクターがメディキットを装備していると、アイコンが左に表示される。アイコンが表示されていない場合は、インベントリくと装備できる。メディキットを使用するには、{console_bind|DPadVertical}で左のアイコンを選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}で選択を確定する。次に、治療が必要なキャラクターを選ぶか、{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}トラッカーで対象キャラのプロフィール画像を選択して{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。メディキットは、隣接しているキャラクターにしか使用できない。 メディキットを使えるのは、戦場衛生兵か基本スキル：メディケアを持つキャラクター、または{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルを最低1度向上させたキャラクターのみ。メディケア{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}結果で回復する負傷耐性の量が決まる。 各メディキットにはチャージ数が2個以上あり、1回の使用で1チャージ消費される。一度使用したメディキットは画面下のパネルから消えるので、定期的に新しいメディキットを忘れずキャラクターに装備しよう。 回復は他の行動と同様に、戦闘中にキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を消費するので注意が必要だ。
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用すると、戦闘中にグループメンバーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復したり、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}怪我{/g}を治療したり、特定の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}を取り除いたりすることができる。（キャラクターが負傷していたり、それらの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}に悩まされている場合）。キャラクターがメディキットを装備している場合、アイコンが左側に表示される。アイコンがない場合は、インベントリを開き、メディキットを装備する。メディキットを使用するには、左のアイコンを{console_bind|DPadY}で選択し、{console_bind|Confirm}で確定する。その後、イニシアチブトラッカーで、治療が必要なキャラクターまたはそのポートレートをターゲットにして、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。キャラクターは隣接するターゲットに対してのみメディキットを使用できる。 メディキットは、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}トレーニング機能を持つキャラクターのみが使用できる。メディケア{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}により、回復する傷の数が決定される。 各メディキットには2つ以上のチャージがあり、1回の使用で1つのチャージが消費される。使用したメディキットは画面下のパネルから消えてしまうので、定期的に新しいメディキットをキャラクターに装備させるようにしよう。 回復は他のアクションと同様、戦闘中、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を消費する。

languages.text: 在战斗中，您可以使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}为同伴恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，或解除某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}（例如角色受伤，或受到部分负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响）。如果角色装备了医疗包，医疗包的图标会在左下角显示。如果没有显示图标，请打开物品栏，双击鼠标左键装备医疗包。若要使用医疗包，按下{console_bind|DPadVertical}选择左侧的医疗包图标，按下{console_bind|Confirm}确认选择。之后选择需要治疗的角色，或在{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}{/g}行动顺序窗口选择该角色的头像，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}。角色只能对相邻的目标使用医疗包。只有拥有野战医疗特性，或拥有基础技能：医疗，或至少进阶过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能一次的角色，才能使用医疗包。使用医疗包时会进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定回复的生命值数量。每个医疗包都可以至少使用2次，每次使用消耗1次使用次数。已经使用过的医疗包会从屏幕下方的面板中消失。因此，别忘了定期为角色配备新的医疗包。请注意，在战斗中使用医疗包与绝大多数行动一样，都会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗中，您可以使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}为同伴恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，或解除某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}（例如角色受伤，或受到部分负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响）。如果角色装备了医疗包，医疗包的图标会在左侧显示。如果没有显示图标，请打开物品栏，装备医疗包。若要使用医疗包，按下{console_bind|DPadY}选择左侧的医疗包图标，按下{console_bind|Confirm}确认选择。之后选择需要治疗的角色，或选择该角色在行动顺序面板中的头像，按下{console_bind|Confirm}即可使用。角色只能对相邻的目标使用医疗包。 只有拥有{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}训练特性的角色，才能使用医疗包。使用医疗包时会进行医疗{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定回复的生命值数量。 每个医疗包都可以至少使用2次，每次使用消耗1次使用次数。已经使用过的医疗包会从屏幕下方的面板中消失。因此，别忘了定期为角色配备新的医疗包。 请注意，在战斗中使用医疗包与绝大多数行动一样，都会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Du kannst ein {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} verwenden, um die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} deiner Gruppenmitglieder im Kampf wiederherzustellen, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} zu behandeln oder bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g} loszuwerden (wenn der Charakter verletzt oder mit einem solchen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} belegt ist). Wenn der Charakter mit einem Medikit ausgerüstet ist, wird das entsprechende Symbol links angezeigt. Wenn kein solches Symbol erscheint, öffne dein Inventar und rüste ein Medikit aus. Um ein Medikit zu benutzen, wähle das Symbol links mit {console_bind|DPadVertical} und bestätige die Auswahl mit {console_bind|Confirm}. Wähle dann den Charakter, der behandelt werden muss oder sein Porträt im {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g}-Tracker und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Ein Charakter kann ein Medikit nur auf ein Ziel anwenden, das sich neben ihm befindet. Medikits können nur von Charakteren verwendet werden, die über das Feature Gefechtssanitäter oder die Grundfertigkeit: Medicae verfügen oder mindestens einmal {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Fertigkeitsfortschritt verwendet haben. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf die Medicae-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeit{/g} bestimmt die Anzahl der wiederhergestellten Wunden. Jedes Medikit bietet 2 oder mehr Anwendungen, wobei pro Benutzung 1 Anwendung verbraucht wird. Benutzte Medikits verschwinden aus dem Panel am unteren Bildschirmrand, also denke daran, deine Charaktere regelmäßig mit neuen Medikits auszurüsten. Beachte, dass die Heilung, genau wie die meisten anderen Aktionen, die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} des Charakters im Kampf verbraucht.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst ein {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} verwenden, um die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} deiner Gruppenmitglieder im Kampf wiederherzustellen, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} zu behandeln oder bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g} loszuwerden (wenn der Charakter verletzt oder mit einem solchen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} belegt ist). Wenn der Charakter mit einem Medikit ausgerüstet ist, wird das entsprechende Symbol links angezeigt. Wenn kein solches Symbol erscheint, öffne dein Inventar und rüste ein Medikit aus. Um ein Medikit zu benutzen, wähle das Symbol links mit {console_bind|DPadY} und bestätige die Auswahl mit {console_bind|Confirm}. Wähle dann den Charakter, der behandelt werden muss oder sein Porträt im Initiative-Tracker und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Ein Charakter kann ein Medikit nur auf ein Ziel anwenden, das sich neben ihm befindet. Medikits können nur von Charakteren verwendet werden, die über die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae-{/g}Ausbildung verfügen. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf die Medicae-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeit{/g} bestimmt die Anzahl der wiederhergestellten Wunden. Jedes Medikit bietet 2 oder mehr Anwendungen, wobei pro Benutzung eine Anwendung verbraucht wird. Benutzte Medikits verschwinden aus dem Panel am unteren Bildschirmrand, also denke daran, deine Charaktere regelmäßig mit neuen Medikits auszurüsten. Beachte, dass die Heilung, genau wie die meisten anderen Aktionen, die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} des Charakters im Kampf verbraucht.

languages.text: Vous pouvez utiliser un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} pour soigner les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}lésions{/g} des membres de votre groupe au combat, guérir une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} ou neutraliser certains {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} (si le personnage est blessé ou sous le coup d'un tel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}). Si le personnage est équipé d'un médikit, son icône s'affiche à gauche. Si cette icône n'est pas présente, ouvrez votre inventaire et équipez-le d'un médikit. Pour utiliser un médikit, sélectionnez son icône à gauche à l'aide de {console_bind|DPadVertical}, puis confirmez votre sélection à l'aide de {console_bind|Confirm}. Ensuite, ciblez le personnage qui a besoin d'être soigné ou son portrait dans le traqueur d'{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Un personnage ne peut utiliser un médikit que sur une cible à laquelle il est adjacent. Les médikits ne peuvent être utilisés que par les personnages possédant la caractéristique Médic de Terrain, la compétence de base : Medicae ou ayant reçu au moins une amélioration de la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}.Un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} Medicae détermine le nombre de blessures soignées. Chaque médikit contient un minimum de 2 charges et 1 charge est consommée par utilisation. Les médikits utilisés disparaissent du panneau situé en bas de l'écran. Aussi, pensez à équiper régulièrement vos personnages de nouveaux médikits. Notez que la guérison, comme la plupart des actions, coûte au personnage des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} au combat.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit. To use a medikit, select its icon on the left using {console_bind|DPadVertical} and confirm the selection with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then target the character who requires treatment or select their portrait in the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} tracker and press {console_bind|Confirm}. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Vous pouvez utiliser un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} pour soigner les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}lésions{/g} des membres de votre groupe au combat, guérir une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}blessure{/g} ou neutraliser certains {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g} (si le personnage est blessé ou sous le coup d'un tel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}). Si le personnage est équipé d'un médikit, son icône s'affiche à gauche. Si cette icône n'est pas présente, ouvrez votre inventaire et équipez-le d’un médikit. Pour utiliser un médikit, sélectionnez son icône à gauche à l’aide de {console_bind|DPadY}, puis confirmez votre sélection à l’aide de {console_bind|Confirm}. Ensuite, ciblez le personnage qui a besoin d'être soigné ou son portrait dans le traqueur d'initiative et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Un personnage ne peut utiliser un médikit que sur une cible à laquelle il est adjacent. Seuls les personnages dotés de la caractéristique Formation à {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} peuvent utiliser les médikits. Un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} Medicae détermine le nombre de blessures soignées. Chaque médikit contient un minimum de deux charge et une charge est consommée par utilisation. Les médikits utilisés disparaissent du panneau situé en bas de l'écran. Aussi, pensez à équiper régulièrement vos personnages de nouveaux médikits. Notez que la guérison, comme la plupart des actions, coûte au personnage des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d’action{/g} au combat.
